video.headline: Ramiz Brahimaj submits Austin Vanderford
video.caption: Ramiz Brahimaj locks in a guillotine chokehold on Austin Vanderford and he taps out.
video.title: Ramiz Brahimaj submits Austin Vanderford
video.description: Ramiz Brahimaj locks in a guillotine chokehold on Austin Vanderford and he taps out.

tracking.trackingName: MMA_One-Play (Ramiz Brahimaj submits Austin Vanderford) 2025/10/04 ESHEET

video.headline: Edmen Shahbazyan gets the KO with two seconds left in first round
video.caption: Edmen Shahbazyan drops Andre Muniz with an uppercut, then hits him on the ground until the match was called.
video.title: Edmen Shahbazyan gets the KO with two seconds left in first round
video.description: Edmen Shahbazyan drops Andre Muniz with an uppercut, then hits him on the ground until the match was called.

tracking.trackingName: MMA_One-Play (Edmen Shahbazyan gets the KO with two seconds left in first round) 2025/10/04 ESHEET

video.headline: Daniel Santos drops JooSang Yoo to win by KO
video.caption: Daniel Santos hits a JooSang Yoo with a flithy left hand that drops Yoo, then Santos pounds him until the official calls it.
video.title: Daniel Santos drops JooSang Yoo to win by KO
video.description: Daniel Santos hits a JooSang Yoo with a flithy left hand that drops Yoo, then Santos pounds him until the official calls it.
